definition: dauntless/to summon up courage and determination/using extreme force of will
to volunteer for/to offer to undertake

sentences.english: A man called Mao Sui volunteered.
sentences.chinese: 有一個名叫毛遂的人，自告奮勇願意同去。

sentences.english: Now let's recite the poem we learned last week. Any volunteers?
sentences.chinese: 現在背誦上週學的那首詩。誰自告奮勇？

sentences.english: And the people the men of Israel encouraged themselves, and set their battle again in array in the place where they put themselves in array the first day.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人彼此奮勇，仍在頭一日擺陣的地方又擺陣。

sentences.english: A couple of ex-bulldozer operators and an ex-mason volunteered.
sentences.chinese: 幾個開過推土機和當過泥瓦匠的士兵自告奮勇。

sentences.english: Let me make clear, I never volunteered to get involved in it.
sentences.chinese: 我想說明的是，我從未自告奮勇地介入這一問題。

sentences.english: When the ruffians attacked him, he laid about them vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 當歹徒攻擊他時，他奮勇地跟他們搏鬥。

sentences.english: Is always forward, or a little bit of leg?
sentences.chinese: 是奮勇向前，還是一點點的後腿？

sentences.english: Knowledge in the ocean waves, stepping song, savvy.
sentences.chinese: 知識的海洋中，踏浪而歌，奮勇前進。

sentences.english: Strike up the drum and march courageously.
Star symbol republic inherited the revolutionary tradition, return.
sentences.chinese: 五角星象徵共和國繼承革命傳統，奮勇向前。

sentences.english: ‘I could lend you some books,’Jane offered.
sentences.chinese: “我可以借你一些書，”簡自告奮勇地提議。

sentences.english: O good YaoShang just volunteered to help zhao fatty again.
sentences.chinese: 阿好腰傷剛好就又自告奮勇去給趙胖子幫忙。

sentences.english: Who's willing to volunteer a reason?
Deputy army commander of dragon gold book leads two groups covering 43 army brunt advances courageously.
sentences.chinese: 龍金書副軍長率兩個團掩護四十三軍主力奮勇前進。

sentences.english: Cloud elder sister come forward with girl abortion in picking up the kite.
sentences.chinese: 雲姐自告奮勇，帶丫鬟小月進去撿風箏。

sentences.english: Workers, peasants and soldiers march forward bravely. The Great Revolution surges high.
sentences.chinese: 工農兵奮勇前進，大革命洶湧澎湃。

definition: guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
one falls, the next follows (idiom); stepping into the breach to replace fallen comrades/advancing wave upon wave
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
Tai'erzhuang district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong
to get into difficulties/to meet with danger
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
